choose.when: select e.employee_code, e.employee_name, eh.hobby, eh.special_ability, eh.height, eh.weight, eh.blood_type, eh.handicapped_yn, eh.marriage_yn, eh.religion, eh.military_type, eh.military_number, eh.discharge_yn, eh.residential_division from employee e, employee_hr_info eh where e.employee_code = eh.employee_code and e.employee_code = #{Semployee_code} order by e.employee_code

select e.employee_code, e.employee_name, eh.hobby, eh.special_ability, eh.height, eh.weight, eh.blood_type, eh.handicapped_yn, eh.marriage_yn, eh.religion, eh.military_type, eh.military_number, eh.discharge_yn, eh.residential_division from employee e, employee_hr_info eh, department d, employee_work ew where e.employee_code = eh.employee_code and e.employee_code = ew.employee_code and ew.department_code = d.department_code and d.department_code = #{Sdepartment_code} order by e.employee_code

select e.employee_code, e.employee_name, eh.hobby, eh.special_ability, eh.height, eh.weight, eh.blood_type, eh.handicapped_yn, eh.marriage_yn, eh.religion, eh.military_type, eh.military_number, eh.discharge_yn, eh.residential_division from employee e, employee_hr_info eh where e.employee_code = eh.employee_code order by e.employee_code

mapper.select: select license_code, license_name from license order by license_code
select assessment_code, assessment_name from assessment order by assessment_code
select rnp_code, rnp_name from rnp order by rnp_code
select language_code, language_name from language order by language_code
mapper.insert: insert into employee_career(employee_code,career_code,company_name,start_date,end_date,sum_year,role,position, salary,reason, total_work, int_user_id, int_date) values(#{x},career_code_seq.nextval,#{company_name},#{start_date},#{end_date},#{sum_year},#{role},#{position}, #{salary}, #{reason}, #{total_work}, #{user}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select e.employee_license_code, e.license_code, l.license_name, e.start_date, e.end_date, e.license_number, e.institute, e.bonus from employee_license e , license l where e.license_code = l.license_code and employee_code = #{x}

select i.hr_appoint_index_name, a.appoint_code, a.appoint_title, a.appoint_date, w.work_status_name, s.site_name, d.department_name, p.position_name, dt.duty_name, e.employee_name from hr_appoint a, hr_appoint_history h, hr_appoint_index i, employee e, employee_work ew, site s, department d, position p, duty dt, work_status w where h.appoint_employee_code = ew.employee_code and h.appoint_code = a.appoint_code(+) and h.appoint_index_code = i.hr_appoint_index_code(+) and h.site_code = s.site_code(+) and h.department_code = d.department_code(+) and h.position_code = p.position_code(+) and h.duty_code = dt.duty_code(+) and a.masteremployee_code = e.employee_code(+) and h.work_status_code = w.work_status_code(+) and h.appoint_employee_code = #{x} and a.appoint_yn = '마감완료' order by a.appoint_code

select h.hr_assessment_code, h.assessment_code, a.assessment_name, h.hr_assessment_test_start_date, h.hr_assessment_test_end_date, h.hr_assessment_date, h.hr_assessment_master, h.hr_assessment_reflection_pcnt, h.hr_assessment_score, h.hr_assessment_grade from hr_assessment h, assessment a where h.assessment_code = a.assessment_code and h.employee_code = #{x} order by h.hr_assessment_code

select e.business_trip_code, c.country_name, e.area, e.start_date, e.end_date, e.flight_cost, e.self_burden, e.company_burden, e.ect_cost, e.total_cost, e.purpose from employee_business_trip e , country c where e.country_code = c.country_code and e.employee_code = #{x}

select h.hr_rnp_code, h.hr_rnp_index, h.rnp_code, r.rnp_name, h.hr_rnp_date, h.hr_rnp_history, h.hr_rnp_institute, h.hr_rnp_cost, h.hr_rnp_start_date, h.hr_rnp_end_date from hr_rnp h, rnp r where h.rnp_code = r.rnp_code and h.employee_code = #{x} order by h.hr_rnp_code

select e.employee_language_code, e.language_code, e.employee_code, l.language_name, e.start_date, e.end_date, e.grade, e.institute from employee_language e, language l where e.language_code = l.language_code and e.employee_code = #{x}
mapper.insert: insert into employee_language(employee_code, employee_language_code, language_code, start_date, end_date,grade, institute, int_user_id, int_date) values(#{x},employee_language_code_seq.nextval, #{language_code}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{grade}, #{institute}, #{user}, sysdate)
